important-note: *Order are shipped within 1-2 business days (Douala) and 2-5 business days (in other cities). After placing your order we will send you an e-mail to guide you through the process.
delivery-and-return-note: Free delivery and free return for Douala V dwellers.

modal.title: CREATE AN ALERT TO GET SIZE UPDATES
modal.content: Confirm and we'll send you an e-mail notification when your size is back in stock.
